context.name: BSA Comet Evo Silentium .22 Air Rifle
context.excerpt: The BSA Comet Evo Silentium Air Rifle is a great all-rounder, nicely configured & providing powerful performance. This air rifle is perfect for hunting or target practice on the range.
context.content:
The BSA Comet Evo Silentium Air Rifle is a great all-rounder. A nicely configured air rifle that provides powerful performance. The Comet Evo Silentium 22 air rifle is perfect for hunting or target practice on the range.

 

BSA Comet Evo Silentium .22 Air Rifle Specifications:

Calibre .22
Power(approx.) 11.5 ft/lbs
Barrel Thread Fixed Silencer
Stock Ambidextrous Sythetic
Overall Length 112cm
Barrel Length 37cm
Weight 3kg
Sights Front Fiber sight & rear Fiber adjustable Sight.
Safety Manual Safety
